description:
True two bedroom soho/nolita flat.  Great neighborhood, surrounded by great bars, shops, cafes and close to most major subway lines. GREAT LOCATION - 5min walk to most train lines. 10-15min from most parts of Manhattan & Brooklyn.  Roof-deck patio, fully equipped kitchen, wifi, cable and washer dryer unit in the building.

--Two bedrooms; one new queen bed and one new full size bed
--Kitchen is furnished
 --1 Shared bathroom (is always kept clean)
 --Roof-deck patio
GREAT LOCATION - 5min walk to most train lines.  10-15min from most parts of Manhattan & Brooklyn.   Apt is surrounded by amazing bars restaurants, shops!
name: Soho/Nolita Apartment w/Rooftop Terrace
review: The host canceled this reservation 161 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
